attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please accept our British Sign Language is our own grammer and to be licenced...

It will make our day and to be free from barriers.

Please make our dream come true before New Year 2009. THat is all we wanted from you

Happy Signing

Jacqueline xxx

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a request for action.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
